title: How to Make a Pillow out of Jeans

steps.headline: Gather your jeans and sewing supplies.
Make a decision.
steps.description: Would you like to cut your jeans into a pair of shorts? Would you like to cut your jeans into capris for now and then shorts at a later time?

steps.headline: Make another decision.
steps.description: Would you like a square pillow? Would you like a short or long rectangular pillow?

steps.headline: Cut the pant legs off your jeans.
steps.description: Cut horizontally to your desired length.

steps.headline: Cut off and discard the bulky hems of both lower pant legs.
Cut "one" lower pant leg horizontally to your desired pillow length.
Cut and shred any remaining fabric into stuffing.
Stitch "one" opening.
steps.description: Tuck a half-inch of fabric to the inside of the pillow. Stitch it together by hand.

steps.headline: Stuff the pillow with the shredded fabric.
Stitch the remaining opening.

text: Gather your jeans and sewing supplies.  Make a decision. Would you like to cut your jeans into a pair of shorts? Would you like to cut your jeans into capris for now and then shorts at a later time? Make another decision. Would you like a square pillow? Would you like a short or long rectangular pillow? Cut the pant legs off your jeans. Cut horizontally to your desired length. Cut off and discard the bulky hems of both lower pant legs.  Cut "one" lower pant leg horizontally to your desired pillow length.  Cut and shred any remaining fabric into stuffing. Discard the bulky seams. Stitch "one" opening. Tuck a half-inch of fabric to the inside of the pillow. Stitch it together by hand. Stuff the pillow with the shredded fabric. Use additional stuffing if needed. Stitch the remaining opening. Tuck a half-inch of fabric to the inside of the pillow. Stitch it together by hand. Finished.
